price: 15. Mayee! Haddii uusan meel joogin, waxaanu hubaal qaban foodda,
arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kallā la-in lam yantahi lanasfaʿan bil-nāṣiyati
